Hello world! I am Mike Porter, an Associate Professor in the [School of Data Science](https://datascience.virginia.edu/) and the [Department of Engineering Systems and Environment](https://engineering.virginia.edu/departments/engineering-systems-and-environment) at the [University of Virginia](https://www.virginia.edu/). 
This blog contains a collections of short articles on data, models, and investigations related to the COVID-19 pandemic.
